channel.title: Error Checking - Fletcher's Checksum :: Intro CS Textbook
channel.description: < warning-1 The C2 total on the slide at 0:54 - 2:10 is incorrect. The total is 7336 but that value modulo 255 is 196, not 96 as shown in the video. YouTube Video Resources Slides Video Script Let’s look at an even better way to do a checksum to check and see if our data is correct. This is called Fletcher’s checksum. And here we’re giving a quick pseudocode of the algorithm that is used to generate Fletcher’s checksum.
